overview: The concert is part of the cycle Luis Alberto Spinetta: Essential Discs, dedicated to revisiting his productions that left a mark on the collective memory. 40 years after the original recording, a fundamental album by Spinetta, Kamikaze, is recreated with Lucio Mantel conducting, arranging, guitar and vocals, Nicolás Rainone on double bass, electric bass, guqin and vocals, Alejandro Franov on piano, keyboards, tabla and sitar and Martín Lambert on drums and octapad.  As guests, Juana Aguirre, Candelaria Zamar, Raúl Orozco and Fernando Barrientos participate in voices and the Divergent Quartet, with Alejandro Terán in arrangements and direction for string quartet, Javier Casalla in violin, Julio Domínguez in violin and Jacqueline Oroc in violoncello.
title: Spinetta. Discos esenciales: Kamikaze
